-- | Describes a parameter for an action.

--   <i>See:</i> <a>newActionParameter</a> smart constructor.
data ActionParameter
ActionParameter' :: Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> ActionParameter

-- | Indicates whether the parameter is required.
[$sel:required:ActionParameter'] :: ActionParameter -> Maybe Bool

-- | The parameter description.
[$sel:description:ActionParameter'] :: ActionParameter -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ActionParameter</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.

--   <a>actionParameter_description</a> - The parameter description.

-- | The parameter description.

module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ActionSummary

-- | Provides a summary of an action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newActionSummary</a> smart constructor.
data ActionSummary
ActionSummary' :: Maybe (HashMap Text ActionTarget) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> ActionSummary

-- | The targets for the action.
[$sel:targets:ActionSummary'] :: ActionSummary -> Maybe (HashMap Text ActionTarget)

-- | The ID of the action.
[$sel:id:ActionSummary'] :: ActionSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The description for the action.
[$sel:description:ActionSummary'] :: ActionSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags for the action.
[$sel:tags:ActionSummary'] :: ActionSummary -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Create a value of <a>ActionSummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:ActionSummary'</a>,
--   <a>actionSummary_description</a> - The description for the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:ActionSummary'</a>, <a>actionSummary_tags</a> - The tags
--   for the action.
newActionSummary :: ActionSummary

-- | The targets for the action.

-- | The ID of the action.

-- | The description for the action.

-- | The tags for the action.
actionSummary_tags :: Lens' ActionSummary (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.Action

-- | Describes an action. For more information, see <a>AWS FIS actions</a>
--   in the <i>AWS Fault Injection Simulator User Guide</i>.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAction</a> smart constructor.
data Action
Action' :: Maybe (HashMap Text ActionParameter) -> Maybe (HashMap Text ActionTarget) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Action

-- | The action parameters, if applicable.
[$sel:parameters:Action'] :: Action -> Maybe (HashMap Text ActionParameter)

-- | The supported targets for the action.
[$sel:targets:Action'] :: Action -> Maybe (HashMap Text ActionTarget)

-- | The ID of the action.
[$sel:id:Action'] :: Action -> Maybe Text

-- | The description for the action.
[$sel:description:Action'] :: Action -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags for the action.
[$sel:tags:Action'] :: Action -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Create a value of <a>Action</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:parameters:Action'</a>, <a>action_parameters</a> - The action
--   parameters, if applicable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:targets:Action'</a>, <a>action_targets</a> - The supported
--   targets for the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Action'</a>, <a>action_id</a> - The ID of the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Action'</a>, <a>action_description</a> - The
--   description for the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:Action'</a>, <a>action_tags</a> - The tags for the
--   action.
newAction :: Action

-- | The action parameters, if applicable.
action_parameters :: Lens' Action (Maybe (HashMap Text ActionParameter))

-- | The supported targets for the action.
action_targets :: Lens' Action (Maybe (HashMap Text ActionTarget))

-- | The ID of the action.
action_id :: Lens' Action (Maybe Text)

-- | The description for the action.
action_description :: Lens' Action (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags for the action.
action_tags :: Lens' Action (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FIS.Types.Action.Action
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.Types.Action.Action
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.Types.Action.Action

-- | The name of the action that must be completed before the current
--   action starts. Omit this parameter to run the action at the start of
--   the experiment.

-- | Specifies a stop condition for an experiment template.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput</a> smart
--   constructor.
data CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput
CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch alarm. This is
--   required if the source is a CloudWatch alarm.
[$sel:value:CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput -> Maybe Text

-- | The source for the stop condition. Specify
--   <tt>aws:cloudwatch:alarm</tt> if the stop condition is defined by a
--   CloudWatch alarm. Specify <tt>none</tt> if there is no stop condition.
[$sel:source:CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput -> Text

-- | Describes the action for an experiment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentAction</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentAction
ExperimentAction' :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe ExperimentActionState -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe Text -> ExperimentAction

-- | The name of the action that must be completed before this action
--   starts.
[$sel:startAfter:ExperimentAction'] :: ExperimentAction -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The state of the action.

module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentState

-- | Describes the state of an experiment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentState</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentState
ExperimentState' :: Maybe ExperimentStatus -> Maybe Text -> ExperimentState

-- | The state of the experiment.
[$sel:status:ExperimentState'] :: ExperimentState -> Maybe ExperimentStatus

-- | The reason for the state.
[$sel:reason:ExperimentState'] :: ExperimentState -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ExperimentState</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:ExperimentState'</a>, <a>experimentState_status</a> -
--   The state of the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:reason:ExperimentState'</a>, <a>experimentState_reason</a> -
--   The reason for the state.
newExperimentState :: ExperimentState

-- | The state of the experiment.
experimentState_status :: Lens' ExperimentState (Maybe ExperimentStatus)

-- | The reason for the state.
experimentState_reason :: Lens' ExperimentState (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentState.ExperimentState
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentState.ExperimentState
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentState.ExperimentState
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentState.ExperimentState
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentState.ExperimentState
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentState.ExperimentState
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentState.ExperimentState


module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentStopCondition

-- | Describes the stop condition for an experiment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentStopCondition</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentStopCondition
ExperimentStopCondition' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> ExperimentStopCondition

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch alarm, if applicable.
[$sel:value:ExperimentStopCondition'] :: ExperimentStopCondition -> Maybe Text

-- | The source for the stop condition.
[$sel:source:ExperimentStopCondition'] :: ExperimentStopCondition -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ExperimentStopCondition</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:ExperimentStopCondition'</a>,
--   <a>experimentStopCondition_value</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN)
--   of the CloudWatch alarm, if applicable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:source:ExperimentStopCondition'</a>,
--   <a>experimentStopCondition_source</a> - The source for the stop
--   condition.
newExperimentStopCondition :: ExperimentStopCondition

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch alarm, if applicable.
experimentStopCondition_value :: Lens' ExperimentStopCondition (Maybe Text)

-- | The source for the stop condition.
experimentStopCondition_source :: Lens' ExperimentStopCondition (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentStopCondition.ExperimentStopCondition
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentStopCondition.ExperimentStopCondition
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentStopCondition.ExperimentStopCondition
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentStopCondition.ExperimentStopCondition
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentStopCondition.ExperimentStopCondition
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentStopCondition.ExperimentStopCondition
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentStopCondition.ExperimentStopCondition


module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentSummary

-- | Provides a summary of an experiment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentSummary</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentSummary
ExperimentSummary' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ExperimentState -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> ExperimentSummary

-- | The time that the experiment was created.
[$sel:creationTime:ExperimentSummary'] :: ExperimentSummary -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
[$sel:experimentTemplateId:ExperimentSummary'] :: ExperimentSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The state of the experiment.
[$sel:state:ExperimentSummary'] :: ExperimentSummary -> Maybe ExperimentState

-- | The ID of the experiment.
[$sel:id:ExperimentSummary'] :: ExperimentSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags for the experiment.
[$sel:tags:ExperimentSummary'] :: ExperimentSummary -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Create a value of <a>ExperimentSummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:ExperimentSummary'</a>,
--   <a>experimentSummary_creationTime</a> - The time that the experiment
--   was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:experimentTemplateId:ExperimentSummary'</a>,
--   <a>experimentSummary_experimentTemplateId</a> - The ID of the
--   experiment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:ExperimentSummary'</a>, <a>experimentSummary_state</a> -
--   The state of the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:ExperimentSummary'</a>, <a>experimentSummary_id</a> - The
--   ID of the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:ExperimentSummary'</a>, <a>experimentSummary_tags</a> -
--   The tags for the experiment.
newExperimentSummary :: ExperimentSummary

-- | The time that the experiment was created.
experimentSummary_creationTime :: Lens' ExperimentSummary (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
experimentSummary_experimentTemplateId :: Lens' ExperimentSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The state of the experiment.
experimentSummary_state :: Lens' ExperimentSummary (Maybe ExperimentState)

-- | The ID of the experiment.
experimentSummary_id :: Lens' ExperimentSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags for the experiment.
experimentSummary_tags :: Lens' ExperimentSummary (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentSummary.ExperimentSummary
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentSummary.ExperimentSummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentSummary.ExperimentSummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentSummary.ExperimentSummary
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentSummary.ExperimentSummary
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentSummary.ExperimentSummary
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentSummary.ExperimentSummary


module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTargetFilter

-- | Describes a filter used for the target resources in an experiment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentTargetFilter</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentTargetFilter
ExperimentTargetFilter' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe [Text] -> ExperimentTargetFilter

-- | The attribute path for the filter.
[$sel:path:ExperimentTargetFilter'] :: ExperimentTargetFilter -> Maybe Text

-- | The attribute values for the filter.
[$sel:values:ExperimentTargetFilter'] :: ExperimentTargetFilter -> Maybe [Text]

-- | Create a value of <a>ExperimentTargetFilter</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:path:ExperimentTargetFilter'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTargetFilter_path</a> - The attribute path for the
--   filter.
--   
--   <a>$sel:values:ExperimentTargetFilter'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTargetFilter_values</a> - The attribute values for the
--   filter.
newExperimentTargetFilter :: ExperimentTargetFilter

-- | The attribute path for the filter.
experimentTargetFilter_path :: Lens' ExperimentTargetFilter (Maybe Text)

-- | The attribute values for the filter.
experimentTargetFilter_values :: Lens' ExperimentTargetFilter (Maybe [Text])
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTargetFilter.ExperimentTargetFilter
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTargetFilter.ExperimentTargetFilter
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTargetFilter.ExperimentTargetFilter
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTargetFilter.ExperimentTargetFilter

instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTargetFilter.ExperimentTargetFilter


module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTarget

-- | Describes a target for an experiment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentTarget</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentTarget
ExperimentTarget' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe [ExperimentTargetFilter] -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> ExperimentTarget

-- | The resource type.
[$sel:resourceType:ExperimentTarget'] :: ExperimentTarget -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags for the target resources.
[$sel:resourceTags:ExperimentTarget'] :: ExperimentTarget -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific
--   attributes.
[$sel:filters:ExperimentTarget'] :: ExperimentTarget -> Maybe [ExperimentTargetFilter]

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the resources.
[$sel:resourceArns:ExperimentTarget'] :: ExperimentTarget -> Maybe [Text]

-- | Scopes the identified resources to a specific count or percentage.
[$sel:selectionMode:ExperimentTarget'] :: ExperimentTarget -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ExperimentTarget</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceType:ExperimentTarget'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTarget_resourceType</a> - The resource type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceTags:ExperimentTarget'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTarget_resourceTags</a> - The tags for the target
--   resources.
--   
--   <a>$sel:filters:ExperimentTarget'</a>, <a>experimentTarget_filters</a>
--   - The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific
--   attributes.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceArns:ExperimentTarget'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTarget_resourceArns</a> - The Amazon Resource Names
--   (ARNs) of the resources.
--   
--   <a>$sel:selectionMode:ExperimentTarget'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTarget_selectionMode</a> - Scopes the identified
--   resources to a specific count or percentage.
newExperimentTarget :: ExperimentTarget

-- | The resource type.
experimentTarget_resourceType :: Lens' ExperimentTarget (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags for the target resources.
experimentTarget_resourceTags :: Lens' ExperimentTarget (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific
--   attributes.
experimentTarget_filters :: Lens' ExperimentTarget (Maybe [ExperimentTargetFilter])

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the resources.
experimentTarget_resourceArns :: Lens' ExperimentTarget (Maybe [Text])

-- | Scopes the identified resources to a specific count or percentage.
experimentTarget_selectionMode :: Lens' ExperimentTarget (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTarget.ExperimentTarget
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTarget.ExperimentTarget
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTarget.ExperimentTarget
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTarget.ExperimentTarget
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTarget.ExperimentTarget
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTarget.ExperimentTarget
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTarget.ExperimentTarget


module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.Experiment

-- | Describes an experiment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperiment</a> smart constructor.
data Experiment
Experiment' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ExperimentState -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentAction) -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe [ExperimentStopCondition] -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTarget) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe Text -> Experiment

-- | The time the experiment was created.
[$sel:creationTime:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
[$sel:experimentTemplateId:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe Text

-- | The state of the experiment.
[$sel:state:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe ExperimentState

-- | The actions for the experiment.
[$sel:actions:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentAction)

-- | The time that the experiment was started.
[$sel:startTime:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The stop conditions for the experiment.
[$sel:stopConditions:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe [ExperimentStopCondition]

-- | The time that the experiment ended.
[$sel:endTime:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The targets for the experiment.
[$sel:targets:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTarget)

-- | The ID of the experiment.
[$sel:id:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags for the experiment.
[$sel:tags:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS FIS
--   service permission to perform service actions on your behalf.
[$sel:roleArn:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Experiment</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_creationTime</a> -
--   The time the experiment was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:experimentTemplateId:Experiment'</a>,
--   <a>experiment_experimentTemplateId</a> - The ID of the experiment
--   template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_state</a> - The state of
--   the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actions:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_actions</a> - The
--   actions for the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:startTime:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_startTime</a> - The
--   time that the experiment was started.
--   
--   <a>$sel:stopConditions:Experiment'</a>,
--   <a>experiment_stopConditions</a> - The stop conditions for the
--   experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:endTime:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_endTime</a> - The time
--   that the experiment ended.
--   
--   <a>$sel:targets:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_targets</a> - The
--   targets for the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_id</a> - The ID of the
--   experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_tags</a> - The tags for
--   the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_roleArn</a> - The
--   Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS FIS
--   service permission to perform service actions on your behalf.
newExperiment :: Experiment

-- | The time the experiment was created.
experiment_creationTime :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
experiment_experimentTemplateId :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe Text)

-- | The state of the experiment.
experiment_state :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe ExperimentState)

-- | The actions for the experiment.
experiment_actions :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentAction))

-- | The time that the experiment was started.
experiment_startTime :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The stop conditions for the experiment.
experiment_stopConditions :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe [ExperimentStopCondition])

-- | The time that the experiment ended.
experiment_endTime :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The targets for the experiment.
experiment_targets :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTarget))

-- | The ID of the experiment.
experiment_id :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags for the experiment.
experiment_tags :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS FIS
--   service permission to perform service actions on your behalf.
experiment_roleArn :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FIS.Types.Experiment.Experiment
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.Types.Experiment.Experiment
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.Types.Experiment.Experiment
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FIS.Types.Experiment.Experiment
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.FIS.Types.Experiment.Experiment
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FIS.Types.Experiment.Experiment
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FIS.Types.Experiment.Experiment


module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateAction

-- | Describes an action for an experiment template.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentTemplateAction</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentTemplateAction
ExperimentTemplateAction' :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe Text -> ExperimentTemplateAction

-- | The name of the action that must be completed before the current
--   action starts.
[$sel:startAfter:ExperimentTemplateAction'] :: ExperimentTemplateAction -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The ID of the action.
[$sel:actionId:ExperimentTemplateAction'] :: ExperimentTemplateAction -> Maybe Text

-- | The parameters for the action.
[$sel:parameters:ExperimentTemplateAction'] :: ExperimentTemplateAction -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The targets for the action.
[$sel:targets:ExperimentTemplateAction'] :: ExperimentTemplateAction -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | A description for the action.
[$sel:description:ExperimentTemplateAction'] :: ExperimentTemplateAction -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ExperimentTemplateAction</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:startAfter:ExperimentTemplateAction'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplateAction_startAfter</a> - The name of the action
--   that must be completed before the current action starts.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actionId:ExperimentTemplateAction'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplateAction_actionId</a> - The ID of the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:parameters:ExperimentTemplateAction'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplateAction_parameters</a> - The parameters for the
--   action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:targets:ExperimentTemplateAction'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplateAction_targets</a> - The targets for the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:ExperimentTemplateAction'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplateAction_description</a> - A description for the
--   action.
newExperimentTemplateAction :: ExperimentTemplateAction

-- | The name of the action that must be completed before the current
--   action starts.
experimentTemplateAction_startAfter :: Lens' ExperimentTemplateAction (Maybe [Text])

-- | The ID of the action.
experimentTemplateAction_actionId :: Lens' ExperimentTemplateAction (Maybe Text)

-- | The parameters for the action.
experimentTemplateAction_parameters :: Lens' ExperimentTemplateAction (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The targets for the action.
experimentTemplateAction_targets :: Lens' ExperimentTemplateAction (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | A description for the action.
experimentTemplateAction_description :: Lens' ExperimentTemplateAction (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateAction.ExperimentTemplateAction
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateAction.ExperimentTemplateAction
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateAction.ExperimentTemplateAction
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateAction.ExperimentTemplateAction
instance Data.Aeson.Types.FromJSON.FromJSON Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateAction.ExperimentTemplateAction
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateAction.ExperimentTemplateAction
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateAction.ExperimentTemplateAction

-- | Provides a summary of an experiment template.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentTemplateSummary</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentTemplateSummary
ExperimentTemplateSummary' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> ExperimentTemplateSummary

-- | The time that the experiment template was created.
[$sel:creationTime:ExperimentTemplateSummary'] :: ExperimentTemplateSummary -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
[$sel:id:ExperimentTemplateSummary'] :: ExperimentTemplateSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The time that the experiment template was last updated.
[$sel:lastUpdateTime:ExperimentTemplateSummary'] :: ExperimentTemplateSummary -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The description of the experiment template.
[$sel:description:ExperimentTemplateSummary'] :: ExperimentTemplateSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags for the experiment template.
[$sel:tags:ExperimentTemplateSummary'] :: ExperimentTemplateSummary -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

--   fields omitted.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   experiment template was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:ExperimentTemplateSummary'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplateSummary_id</a> - The ID of the experiment
--   template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdateTime:ExperimentTemplateSummary'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplateSummary_lastUpdateTime</a> - The time that the
--   experiment template was last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:ExperimentTemplateSummary'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplateSummary_description</a> - The description of the
--   experiment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:ExperimentTemplateSummary'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplateSummary_tags</a> - The tags for the experiment
--   template.

experimentTemplateSummary_tags :: Lens' ExperimentTemplateSummary (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateSummary.ExperimentTemplateSummary
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateSummary.ExperimentTemplateSummary
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateSummary.ExperimentTemplateSummary

instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateSummary.ExperimentTemplateSummary


module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter

-- | Describes a filter used for the target resources in an experiment
--   template.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentTemplateTargetFilter</a> smart
--   constructor.
data ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter
ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe [Text] -> ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter

-- | The attribute path for the filter.
[$sel:path:ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter'] :: ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter -> Maybe Text

-- | The attribute values for the filter.
[$sel:values:ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter'] :: ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter -> Maybe [Text]

-- | Create a value of <a>ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:path:ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplateTargetFilter_path</a> - The attribute path for
--   the filter.
--   
--   <a>$sel:values:ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplateTargetFilter_values</a> - The attribute values
--   for the filter.
newExperimentTemplateTargetFilter :: ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter

-- | The attribute path for the filter.
experimentTemplateTargetFilter_path :: Lens' ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter (Maybe Text)

-- | The attribute values for the filter.
experimentTemplateTargetFilter_values :: Lens' ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter (Maybe [Text])
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter.ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter.ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter.ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter.ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter

module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplateTarget

-- | Describes a target for an experiment template.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentTemplateTarget</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentTemplateTarget
ExperimentTemplateTarget' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter] -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> ExperimentTemplateTarget

-- | The resource type.
[$sel:resourceType:ExperimentTemplateTarget'] :: ExperimentTemplateTarget -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags for the target resources.
[$sel:resourceTags:ExperimentTemplateTarget'] :: ExperimentTemplateTarget -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific
--   attributes.
[$sel:filters:ExperimentTemplateTarget'] :: ExperimentTemplateTarget -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateTargetFilter]

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the targets.
[$sel:resourceArns:ExperimentTemplateTarget'] :: ExperimentTemplateTarget -> Maybe [Text]

-- | Scopes the identified resources to a specific count or percentage.
[$sel:selectionMode:ExperimentTemplateTarget'] :: ExperimentTemplateTarget -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ExperimentTemplateTarget</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.

--   resources.

--   identify target resources using specific attributes.

--   Names (ARNs) of the targets.

module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplate

-- | Describes an experiment template.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentTemplate</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentTemplate
ExperimentTemplate' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTemplateAction) -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateStopCondition] -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTemplateTarget) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe Text -> ExperimentTemplate

-- | The time the experiment template was created.
[$sel:creationTime:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The actions for the experiment.
[$sel:actions:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTemplateAction)

-- | The stop conditions for the experiment.
[$sel:stopConditions:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateStopCondition]

-- | The targets for the experiment.
[$sel:targets:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTemplateTarget)

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
[$sel:id:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe Text

-- | The time the experiment template was last updated.
[$sel:lastUpdateTime:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The description for the experiment template.
[$sel:description:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags for the experiment template.
[$sel:tags:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role.
[$sel:roleArn:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ExperimentTemplate</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:ExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplate_creationTime</a> - The time the experiment
--   template was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actions:ExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplate_actions</a> - The actions for the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:stopConditions:ExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplate_stopConditions</a> - The stop conditions for the
--   experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:targets:ExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplate_targets</a> - The targets for the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:ExperimentTemplate'</a>, <a>experimentTemplate_id</a> - The
--   ID of the experiment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdateTime:ExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplate_lastUpdateTime</a> - The time the experiment
--   template was last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:ExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplate_description</a> - The description for the
--   experiment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:ExperimentTemplate'</a>, <a>experimentTemplate_tags</a> -
--   The tags for the experiment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:ExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplate_roleArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of
--   an IAM role.
newExperimentTemplate :: ExperimentTemplate

-- | The time the experiment template was created.
experimentTemplate_creationTime :: Lens' ExperimentTemplate (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The actions for the experiment.
experimentTemplate_actions :: Lens' ExperimentTemplate (Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTemplateAction))

-- | The stop conditions for the experiment.
experimentTemplate_stopConditions :: Lens' ExperimentTemplate (Maybe [ExperimentTemplateStopCondition])

-- | The targets for the experiment.
experimentTemplate_targets :: Lens' ExperimentTemplate (Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTemplateTarget))

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
experimentTemplate_id :: Lens' ExperimentTemplate (Maybe Text)

-- | The time the experiment template was last updated.
experimentTemplate_lastUpdateTime :: Lens' ExperimentTemplate (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The description for the experiment template.
experimentTemplate_description :: Lens' ExperimentTemplate (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags for the experiment template.
experimentTemplate_tags :: Lens' ExperimentTemplate (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role.
experimentTemplate_roleArn :: Lens' ExperimentTemplate (Maybe Text)
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplate.ExperimentTemplate
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplate.ExperimentTemplate
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplate.ExperimentTemplate
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FIS.Types.ExperimentTemplate.ExperimentTemplate

module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput

-- | Specifies a target for an experiment. You must specify at least one
--   Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or at least one resource tag. You cannot
--   specify both ARNs and tags.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput</a> smart
--   constructor.
data CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput' :: Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter] -> Maybe [Text] -> Text -> Text -> CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput

-- | The tags for the target resources.
[$sel:resourceTags:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific
--   attributes.
[$sel:filters:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter]

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the resources.
[$sel:resourceArns:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The AWS resource type. The resource type must be supported for the
--   specified action.
[$sel:resourceType:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Text

-- | Scopes the identified resources to a specific count of the resources
--   at random, or a percentage of the resources. All identified resources
--   are included in the target.
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>ALL - Run the action on all identified targets. This is the
--   default.</li>
--   <li>COUNT(n) - Run the action on the specified number of targets,
--   chosen from the identified targets at random. For example, COUNT(1)
--   selects one of the targets.</li>
--   <li>PERCENT(n) - Run the action on the specified percentage of
--   targets, chosen from the identified targets at random. For example,
--   PERCENT(25) selects 25% of the targets.</li>
--   </ul>
[$sel:selectionMode:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceTags:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceTags</a> - The tags for
--   the target resources.
--   
--   <a>$sel:filters:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_filters</a> - The filters to
--   apply to identify target resources using specific attributes.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceArns:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceArns</a> - The Amazon
--   Resource Names (ARNs) of the resources.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceType:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceType</a> - The AWS
--   resource type. The resource type must be supported for the specified
--   action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:selectionMode:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_selectionMode</a> - Scopes the
--   identified resources to a specific count of the resources at random,
--   or a percentage of the resources. All identified resources are
--   included in the target.
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>ALL - Run the action on all identified targets. This is the
--   default.</li>
--   <li>COUNT(n) - Run the action on the specified number of targets,
--   chosen from the identified targets at random. For example, COUNT(1)
--   selects one of the targets.</li>
--   <li>PERCENT(n) - Run the action on the specified percentage of
--   targets, chosen from the identified targets at random. For example,
--   PERCENT(25) selects 25% of the targets.</li>
--   </ul>
newCreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput :: Text -> Text -> CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput

-- | The tags for the target resources.
createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceTags :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific
--   attributes.
createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_filters :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput (Maybe [ExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter])

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the resources.
createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceArns :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput (Maybe [Text])

-- | The AWS resource type. The resource type must be supported for the
--   specified action.
createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceType :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput Text

-- | Scopes the identified resources to a specific count of the resources
--   at random, or a percentage of the resources. All identified resources
--   are included in the target.
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>ALL - Run the action on all identified targets. This is the
--   default.</li>
--   <li>COUNT(n) - Run the action on the specified number of targets,
--   chosen from the identified targets at random. For example, COUNT(1)
--   selects one of the targets.</li>
--   <li>PERCENT(n) - Run the action on the specified percentage of
--   targets, chosen from the identified targets at random. For example,
--   PERCENT(25) selects 25% of the targets.</li>
--   </ul>
createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_selectionMode :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FIS.Types.CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput.CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.Types.CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput.CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.Types.CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput.CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FIS.Types.CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput.CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FIS.Types.CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput.CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FIS.Types.CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput.CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.FIS.Types.CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput.CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput


module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem

-- | Specifies an action for an experiment template.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem</a> smart
--   constructor.
data UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem
UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem' :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe Text -> UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem

-- | The name of the action that must be completed before the current
--   action starts. Omit this parameter to run the action at the start of
--   the experiment.
[$sel:startAfter:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The ID of the action.
[$sel:actionId:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem -> Maybe Text

-- | The parameters for the action, if applicable.
[$sel:parameters:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The targets for the action.
[$sel:targets:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | A description for the action.
[$sel:description:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem</a> with
--   all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:startAfter:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem_startAfter</a> - The name
--   of the action that must be completed before the current action starts.
--   Omit this parameter to run the action at the start of the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actionId:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem_actionId</a> - The ID of
--   the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:parameters:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem_parameters</a> - The
--   parameters for the action, if applicable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:targets:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem_targets</a> - The targets
--   for the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem_description</a> - A
--   description for the action.
newUpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem :: UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem

-- | The name of the action that must be completed before the current
--   action starts. Omit this parameter to run the action at the start of
--   the experiment.
updateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem_startAfter :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem (Maybe [Text])

-- | The ID of the action.
updateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem_actionId :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem (Maybe Text)

updateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem_targets :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput

-- | Specifies a stop condition for an experiment. You can define a stop
--   condition as a CloudWatch alarm.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput</a> smart
--   constructor.
data UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput
UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch alarm.
[$sel:value:UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput -> Maybe Text

-- | The source for the stop condition. Specify
--   <tt>aws:cloudwatch:alarm</tt> if the stop condition is defined by a
--   CloudWatch alarm. Specify <tt>none</tt> if there is no stop condition.
[$sel:source:UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput</a>
--   with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:value:UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput_value</a> - The Amazon
--   Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch alarm.
--   
--   <a>$sel:source:UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput_source</a> - The source
--   for the stop condition. Specify <tt>aws:cloudwatch:alarm</tt> if the
--   stop condition is defined by a CloudWatch alarm. Specify <tt>none</tt>
--   if there is no stop condition.
newUpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput :: Text -> UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch alarm.
updateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput_value :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput (Maybe Text)

-- | The source for the stop condition. Specify
--   <tt>aws:cloudwatch:alarm</tt> if the stop condition is defined by a
--   CloudWatch alarm. Specify <tt>none</tt> if there is no stop condition.
updateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput_source :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FIS.Types.UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput.UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.Types.UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput.UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.Types.UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput.UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput

module Network.AWS.FIS.Types.UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput

-- | Specifies a target for an experiment. You must specify at least one
--   Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or at least one resource tag. You cannot
--   specify both.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput</a> smart
--   constructor.
data UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput' :: Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter] -> Maybe [Text] -> Text -> Text -> UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput

-- | The tags for the target resources.
[$sel:resourceTags:UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific
--   attributes.
[$sel:filters:UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter]

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the targets.
[$sel:resourceArns:UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The AWS resource type. The resource type must be supported for the
--   specified action.
[$sel:resourceType:UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Text

-- | Scopes the identified resources to a specific count or percentage.
[$sel:selectionMode:UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceTags:UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceTags</a> - The tags for
--   the target resources.
--   
--   <a>$sel:filters:UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateTargetInput_filters</a> - The filters to
--   apply to identify target resources using specific attributes.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceArns:UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceArns</a> - The Amazon
--   Resource Names (ARNs) of the targets.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceType:UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceType</a> - The AWS
--   resource type. The resource type must be supported for the specified
--   action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:selectionMode:UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateTargetInput_selectionMode</a> - Scopes the
--   identified resources to a specific count or percentage.
newUpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput :: Text -> Text -> UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput

-- | The tags for the target resources.
updateExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceTags :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific
--   attributes.
updateExperimentTemplateTargetInput_filters :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput (Maybe [ExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter])

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the targets.
updateExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceArns :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput (Maybe [Text])

-- | The AWS resource type. The resource type must be supported for the
--   specified action.
updateExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceType :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput Text

-- | Scopes the identified resources to a specific count or percentage.
updateExperimentTemplateTargetInput_selectionMode :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput Text
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FIS.Types.UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput.UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.Types.UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput.UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.Types.UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput.UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FIS.Types.UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput.UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FIS.Types.UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput.UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FIS.Types.UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput.UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
instance Data.Aeson.Types.ToJSON.ToJSON Network.AWS.FIS.Types.UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput.UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput


module Network.AWS.FIS.Types

-- | API version <tt>2020-12-01</tt> of the Amazon Fault Injection
--   Simulator SDK configuration.
defaultService :: Service

-- | The specified input is not valid, or fails to satisfy the constraints
--   for the request.
_ValidationException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The request could not be processed because of a conflict.
_ConflictException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | You have exceeded your service quota.
_ServiceQuotaExceededException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError

-- | The specified resource cannot be found.
_ResourceNotFoundException :: AsError a => Getting (First ServiceError) a ServiceError
newtype ExperimentActionStatus
ExperimentActionStatus' :: Text -> ExperimentActionStatus
[fromExperimentActionStatus] :: ExperimentActionStatus -> Text
pattern ExperimentActionStatus_Cancelled :: ExperimentActionStatus
pattern ExperimentActionStatus_Completed :: ExperimentActionStatus
pattern ExperimentActionStatus_Failed :: ExperimentActionStatus
pattern ExperimentActionStatus_Initiating :: ExperimentActionStatus
pattern ExperimentActionStatus_Pending :: ExperimentActionStatus
pattern ExperimentActionStatus_Running :: ExperimentActionStatus
pattern ExperimentActionStatus_Stopped :: ExperimentActionStatus
pattern ExperimentActionStatus_Stopping :: ExperimentActionStatus
newtype ExperimentStatus
ExperimentStatus' :: Text -> ExperimentStatus
[fromExperimentStatus] :: ExperimentStatus -> Text
pattern ExperimentStatus_Completed :: ExperimentStatus
pattern ExperimentStatus_Failed :: ExperimentStatus
pattern ExperimentStatus_Initiating :: ExperimentStatus
pattern ExperimentStatus_Pending :: ExperimentStatus
pattern ExperimentStatus_Running :: ExperimentStatus
pattern ExperimentStatus_Stopped :: ExperimentStatus
pattern ExperimentStatus_Stopping :: ExperimentStatus

-- | Describes an action. For more information, see <a>AWS FIS actions</a>
--   in the <i>AWS Fault Injection Simulator User Guide</i>.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newAction</a> smart constructor.
data Action
Action' :: Maybe (HashMap Text ActionParameter) -> Maybe (HashMap Text ActionTarget) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Action

-- | The action parameters, if applicable.
[$sel:parameters:Action'] :: Action -> Maybe (HashMap Text ActionParameter)

-- | The supported targets for the action.
[$sel:targets:Action'] :: Action -> Maybe (HashMap Text ActionTarget)

-- | The ID of the action.
[$sel:id:Action'] :: Action -> Maybe Text

-- | The description for the action.
[$sel:description:Action'] :: Action -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags for the action.
[$sel:tags:Action'] :: Action -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Create a value of <a>Action</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:parameters:Action'</a>, <a>action_parameters</a> - The action
--   parameters, if applicable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:targets:Action'</a>, <a>action_targets</a> - The supported
--   targets for the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Action'</a>, <a>action_id</a> - The ID of the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:Action'</a>, <a>action_description</a> - The
--   description for the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:Action'</a>, <a>action_tags</a> - The tags for the
--   action.
newAction :: Action

-- | The action parameters, if applicable.
action_parameters :: Lens' Action (Maybe (HashMap Text ActionParameter))

-- | The supported targets for the action.
action_targets :: Lens' Action (Maybe (HashMap Text ActionTarget))

-- | The ID of the action.
action_id :: Lens' Action (Maybe Text)

-- | The description for the action.
action_description :: Lens' Action (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags for the action.
action_tags :: Lens' Action (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | Describes a parameter for an action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newActionParameter</a> smart constructor.
data ActionParameter
ActionParameter' :: Maybe Bool -> Maybe Text -> ActionParameter

-- | Indicates whether the parameter is required.
[$sel:required:ActionParameter'] :: ActionParameter -> Maybe Bool

-- | The parameter description.
[$sel:description:ActionParameter'] :: ActionParameter -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ActionParameter</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:required:ActionParameter'</a>, <a>actionParameter_required</a>
--   - Indicates whether the parameter is required.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:ActionParameter'</a>,
--   <a>actionParameter_description</a> - The parameter description.
newActionParameter :: ActionParameter

-- | Indicates whether the parameter is required.
actionParameter_required :: Lens' ActionParameter (Maybe Bool)

-- | The parameter description.
actionParameter_description :: Lens' ActionParameter (Maybe Text)

-- | Provides a summary of an action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newActionSummary</a> smart constructor.
data ActionSummary
ActionSummary' :: Maybe (HashMap Text ActionTarget) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> ActionSummary

-- | The targets for the action.
[$sel:targets:ActionSummary'] :: ActionSummary -> Maybe (HashMap Text ActionTarget)

-- | The ID of the action.
[$sel:id:ActionSummary'] :: ActionSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The description for the action.
[$sel:description:ActionSummary'] :: ActionSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags for the action.
[$sel:tags:ActionSummary'] :: ActionSummary -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Create a value of <a>ActionSummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:targets:ActionSummary'</a>, <a>actionSummary_targets</a> - The
--   targets for the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:ActionSummary'</a>, <a>actionSummary_id</a> - The ID of the
--   action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:ActionSummary'</a>,
--   <a>actionSummary_description</a> - The description for the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:ActionSummary'</a>, <a>actionSummary_tags</a> - The tags
--   for the action.
newActionSummary :: ActionSummary

-- | The targets for the action.
actionSummary_targets :: Lens' ActionSummary (Maybe (HashMap Text ActionTarget))

-- | The ID of the action.
actionSummary_id :: Lens' ActionSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The description for the action.
actionSummary_description :: Lens' ActionSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags for the action.
actionSummary_tags :: Lens' ActionSummary (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | Describes a target for an action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newActionTarget</a> smart constructor.
data ActionTarget
ActionTarget' :: Maybe Text -> ActionTarget

-- | The resource type of the target.
[$sel:resourceType:ActionTarget'] :: ActionTarget -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ActionTarget</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.

--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

newActionTarget :: ActionTarget

actionTarget_resourceType :: Lens' ActionTarget (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies an action for an experiment template.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateExperimentTemplateActionInput</a> smart
--   constructor.

CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput' :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe Text -> Text -> CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput

-- | The name of the action that must be completed before the current
--   action starts. Omit this parameter to run the action at the start of
--   the experiment.
[$sel:startAfter:CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The parameters for the action, if applicable.
[$sel:parameters:CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The targets for the action.
[$sel:targets:CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

[$sel:description:CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.

--   fields.

--   Omit this parameter to run the action at the start of the experiment.

--   the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplateActionInput_description</a> - A description
--   for the action.

--   action.
newCreateExperimentTemplateActionInput :: Text -> CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput

-- | The name of the action that must be completed before the current
--   action starts. Omit this parameter to run the action at the start of
--   the experiment.
createExperimentTemplateActionInput_startAfter :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput (Maybe [Text])

-- | The parameters for the action, if applicable.

-- | Specifies a stop condition for an experiment template.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput</a> smart
--   constructor.
data CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput
CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch alarm. This is
--   required if the source is a CloudWatch alarm.
[$sel:value:CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput -> Maybe Text

-- | The source for the stop condition. Specify
--   <tt>aws:cloudwatch:alarm</tt> if the stop condition is defined by a
--   CloudWatch alarm. Specify <tt>none</tt> if there is no stop condition.
[$sel:source:CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput</a>
--   with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--
