--   <a>createExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput_value</a> - The Amazon
--   Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch alarm. This is required if the
--   source is a CloudWatch alarm.
--   
--   <a>$sel:source:CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput_source</a> - The source
--   for the stop condition. Specify <tt>aws:cloudwatch:alarm</tt> if the
--   stop condition is defined by a CloudWatch alarm. Specify <tt>none</tt>
--   if there is no stop condition.
newCreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput :: Text -> CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch alarm. This is
--   required if the source is a CloudWatch alarm.
createExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput_value :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput (Maybe Text)

-- | The source for the stop condition. Specify
--   <tt>aws:cloudwatch:alarm</tt> if the stop condition is defined by a
--   CloudWatch alarm. Specify <tt>none</tt> if there is no stop condition.
createExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput_source :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput Text

-- | Specifies a target for an experiment. You must specify at least one
--   Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or at least one resource tag. You cannot
--   specify both ARNs and tags.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput</a> smart
--   constructor.
data CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput' :: Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter] -> Maybe [Text] -> Text -> Text -> CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput

-- | The tags for the target resources.
[$sel:resourceTags:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific
--   attributes.
[$sel:filters:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter]

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the resources.
[$sel:resourceArns:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The AWS resource type. The resource type must be supported for the
--   specified action.
[$sel:resourceType:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Text

-- | Scopes the identified resources to a specific count of the resources
--   at random, or a percentage of the resources. All identified resources
--   are included in the target.
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>ALL - Run the action on all identified targets. This is the
--   default.</li>
--   <li>COUNT(n) - Run the action on the specified number of targets,
--   chosen from the identified targets at random. For example, COUNT(1)
--   selects one of the targets.</li>
--   <li>PERCENT(n) - Run the action on the specified percentage of
--   targets, chosen from the identified targets at random. For example,
--   PERCENT(25) selects 25% of the targets.</li>
--   </ul>
[$sel:selectionMode:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceTags:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceTags</a> - The tags for
--   the target resources.
--   
--   <a>$sel:filters:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_filters</a> - The filters to
--   apply to identify target resources using specific attributes.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceArns:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceArns</a> - The Amazon
--   Resource Names (ARNs) of the resources.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceType:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceType</a> - The AWS
--   resource type. The resource type must be supported for the specified
--   action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:selectionMode:CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_selectionMode</a> - Scopes the
--   identified resources to a specific count of the resources at random,
--   or a percentage of the resources. All identified resources are
--   included in the target.
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>ALL - Run the action on all identified targets. This is the
--   default.</li>
--   <li>COUNT(n) - Run the action on the specified number of targets,
--   chosen from the identified targets at random. For example, COUNT(1)
--   selects one of the targets.</li>
--   <li>PERCENT(n) - Run the action on the specified percentage of
--   targets, chosen from the identified targets at random. For example,
--   PERCENT(25) selects 25% of the targets.</li>
--   </ul>
newCreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput :: Text -> Text -> CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput

-- | The tags for the target resources.
createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceTags :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific
--   attributes.
createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_filters :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput (Maybe [ExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter])

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the resources.
createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceArns :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput (Maybe [Text])

-- | The AWS resource type. The resource type must be supported for the
--   specified action.
createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceType :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput Text

-- | Scopes the identified resources to a specific count of the resources
--   at random, or a percentage of the resources. All identified resources
--   are included in the target.
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li>ALL - Run the action on all identified targets. This is the
--   default.</li>
--   <li>COUNT(n) - Run the action on the specified number of targets,
--   chosen from the identified targets at random. For example, COUNT(1)
--   selects one of the targets.</li>
--   <li>PERCENT(n) - Run the action on the specified percentage of
--   targets, chosen from the identified targets at random. For example,
--   PERCENT(25) selects 25% of the targets.</li>
--   </ul>
createExperimentTemplateTargetInput_selectionMode :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput Text

-- | Describes an experiment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperiment</a> smart constructor.
data Experiment
Experiment' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ExperimentState -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentAction) -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe [ExperimentStopCondition] -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTarget) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe Text -> Experiment

-- | The time the experiment was created.
[$sel:creationTime:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
[$sel:experimentTemplateId:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe Text

-- | The state of the experiment.
[$sel:state:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe ExperimentState

-- | The actions for the experiment.
[$sel:actions:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentAction)

-- | The time that the experiment was started.
[$sel:startTime:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The stop conditions for the experiment.
[$sel:stopConditions:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe [ExperimentStopCondition]

-- | The time that the experiment ended.
[$sel:endTime:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The targets for the experiment.
[$sel:targets:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTarget)

-- | The ID of the experiment.
[$sel:id:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags for the experiment.
[$sel:tags:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS FIS
--   service permission to perform service actions on your behalf.
[$sel:roleArn:Experiment'] :: Experiment -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>Experiment</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_creationTime</a> -
--   The time the experiment was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:experimentTemplateId:Experiment'</a>,
--   <a>experiment_experimentTemplateId</a> - The ID of the experiment
--   template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_state</a> - The state of
--   the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actions:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_actions</a> - The
--   actions for the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:startTime:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_startTime</a> - The
--   time that the experiment was started.
--   
--   <a>$sel:stopConditions:Experiment'</a>,
--   <a>experiment_stopConditions</a> - The stop conditions for the
--   experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:endTime:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_endTime</a> - The time
--   that the experiment ended.
--   
--   <a>$sel:targets:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_targets</a> - The
--   targets for the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_id</a> - The ID of the
--   experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_tags</a> - The tags for
--   the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:Experiment'</a>, <a>experiment_roleArn</a> - The
--   Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS FIS
--   service permission to perform service actions on your behalf.
newExperiment :: Experiment

-- | The time the experiment was created.
experiment_creationTime :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
experiment_experimentTemplateId :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe Text)

-- | The state of the experiment.
experiment_state :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe ExperimentState)

-- | The actions for the experiment.
experiment_actions :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentAction))

-- | The time that the experiment was started.
experiment_startTime :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The stop conditions for the experiment.
experiment_stopConditions :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe [ExperimentStopCondition])

-- | The time that the experiment ended.
experiment_endTime :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The targets for the experiment.
experiment_targets :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTarget))

-- | The ID of the experiment.
experiment_id :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags for the experiment.
experiment_tags :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS FIS
--   service permission to perform service actions on your behalf.
experiment_roleArn :: Lens' Experiment (Maybe Text)

-- | Describes the action for an experiment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentAction</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentAction
ExperimentAction' :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe ExperimentActionState -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe Text -> ExperimentAction

-- | The name of the action that must be completed before this action
--   starts.
[$sel:startAfter:ExperimentAction'] :: ExperimentAction -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The state of the action.
[$sel:state:ExperimentAction'] :: ExperimentAction -> Maybe ExperimentActionState

-- | The ID of the action.
[$sel:actionId:ExperimentAction'] :: ExperimentAction -> Maybe Text

-- | The parameters for the action.
[$sel:parameters:ExperimentAction'] :: ExperimentAction -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The targets for the action.
[$sel:targets:ExperimentAction'] :: ExperimentAction -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The description for the action.
[$sel:description:ExperimentAction'] :: ExperimentAction -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ExperimentAction</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:startAfter:ExperimentAction'</a>,
--   <a>experimentAction_startAfter</a> - The name of the action that must
--   be completed before this action starts.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:ExperimentAction'</a>, <a>experimentAction_state</a> -
--   The state of the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actionId:ExperimentAction'</a>,
--   <a>experimentAction_actionId</a> - The ID of the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:parameters:ExperimentAction'</a>,
--   <a>experimentAction_parameters</a> - The parameters for the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:targets:ExperimentAction'</a>, <a>experimentAction_targets</a>
--   - The targets for the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:ExperimentAction'</a>,
--   <a>experimentAction_description</a> - The description for the action.
newExperimentAction :: ExperimentAction

-- | The name of the action that must be completed before this action
--   starts.
experimentAction_startAfter :: Lens' ExperimentAction (Maybe [Text])

-- | The state of the action.
experimentAction_state :: Lens' ExperimentAction (Maybe ExperimentActionState)

-- | The ID of the action.
experimentAction_actionId :: Lens' ExperimentAction (Maybe Text)

-- | The parameters for the action.
experimentAction_parameters :: Lens' ExperimentAction (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The targets for the action.
experimentAction_targets :: Lens' ExperimentAction (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The description for the action.
experimentAction_description :: Lens' ExperimentAction (Maybe Text)

-- | Describes the state of an action.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentActionState</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentActionState
ExperimentActionState' :: Maybe ExperimentActionStatus -> Maybe Text -> ExperimentActionState

-- | The state of the action.
[$sel:status:ExperimentActionState'] :: ExperimentActionState -> Maybe ExperimentActionStatus

-- | The reason for the state.
[$sel:reason:ExperimentActionState'] :: ExperimentActionState -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ExperimentActionState</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:ExperimentActionState'</a>,
--   <a>experimentActionState_status</a> - The state of the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:reason:ExperimentActionState'</a>,
--   <a>experimentActionState_reason</a> - The reason for the state.
newExperimentActionState :: ExperimentActionState

-- | The state of the action.
experimentActionState_status :: Lens' ExperimentActionState (Maybe ExperimentActionStatus)

-- | The reason for the state.
experimentActionState_reason :: Lens' ExperimentActionState (Maybe Text)

-- | Describes the state of an experiment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentState</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentState
ExperimentState' :: Maybe ExperimentStatus -> Maybe Text -> ExperimentState

-- | The state of the experiment.
[$sel:status:ExperimentState'] :: ExperimentState -> Maybe ExperimentStatus

-- | The reason for the state.
[$sel:reason:ExperimentState'] :: ExperimentState -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ExperimentState</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:status:ExperimentState'</a>, <a>experimentState_status</a> -
--   The state of the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:reason:ExperimentState'</a>, <a>experimentState_reason</a> -
--   The reason for the state.
newExperimentState :: ExperimentState

-- | The state of the experiment.
experimentState_status :: Lens' ExperimentState (Maybe ExperimentStatus)

-- | The reason for the state.
experimentState_reason :: Lens' ExperimentState (Maybe Text)

-- | Describes the stop condition for an experiment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentStopCondition</a> smart constructor.

-- | Provides a summary of an experiment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentSummary</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentSummary
ExperimentSummary' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe ExperimentState -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> ExperimentSummary

-- | The time that the experiment was created.
[$sel:creationTime:ExperimentSummary'] :: ExperimentSummary -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
[$sel:experimentTemplateId:ExperimentSummary'] :: ExperimentSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The state of the experiment.
[$sel:state:ExperimentSummary'] :: ExperimentSummary -> Maybe ExperimentState

-- | The ID of the experiment.
[$sel:id:ExperimentSummary'] :: ExperimentSummary -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags for the experiment.
[$sel:tags:ExperimentSummary'] :: ExperimentSummary -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Create a value of <a>ExperimentSummary</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:creationTime:ExperimentSummary'</a>,
--   <a>experimentSummary_creationTime</a> - The time that the experiment
--   was created.
--   
--   <a>$sel:experimentTemplateId:ExperimentSummary'</a>,
--   <a>experimentSummary_experimentTemplateId</a> - The ID of the
--   experiment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:state:ExperimentSummary'</a>, <a>experimentSummary_state</a> -
--   The state of the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:ExperimentSummary'</a>, <a>experimentSummary_id</a> - The
--   ID of the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:ExperimentSummary'</a>, <a>experimentSummary_tags</a> -
--   The tags for the experiment.
newExperimentSummary :: ExperimentSummary

-- | The time that the experiment was created.
experimentSummary_creationTime :: Lens' ExperimentSummary (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
experimentSummary_experimentTemplateId :: Lens' ExperimentSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The state of the experiment.
experimentSummary_state :: Lens' ExperimentSummary (Maybe ExperimentState)

-- | The ID of the experiment.
experimentSummary_id :: Lens' ExperimentSummary (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags for the experiment.
experimentSummary_tags :: Lens' ExperimentSummary (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | Describes a target for an experiment.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentTarget</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentTarget
ExperimentTarget' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe [ExperimentTargetFilter] -> Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> ExperimentTarget

-- | The resource type.
[$sel:resourceType:ExperimentTarget'] :: ExperimentTarget -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags for the target resources.
[$sel:resourceTags:ExperimentTarget'] :: ExperimentTarget -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific
--   attributes.
[$sel:filters:ExperimentTarget'] :: ExperimentTarget -> Maybe [ExperimentTargetFilter]

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the resources.
[$sel:resourceArns:ExperimentTarget'] :: ExperimentTarget -> Maybe [Text]

-- | Scopes the identified resources to a specific count or percentage.
[$sel:selectionMode:ExperimentTarget'] :: ExperimentTarget -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ExperimentTarget</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceType:ExperimentTarget'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTarget_resourceType</a> - The resource type.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceTags:ExperimentTarget'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTarget_resourceTags</a> - The tags for the target
--   resources.
--   
--   <a>$sel:filters:ExperimentTarget'</a>, <a>experimentTarget_filters</a>
--   - The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific
--   attributes.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceArns:ExperimentTarget'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTarget_resourceArns</a> - The Amazon Resource Names
--   (ARNs) of the resources.
--   
--   <a>$sel:selectionMode:ExperimentTarget'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTarget_selectionMode</a> - Scopes the identified
--   resources to a specific count or percentage.
newExperimentTarget :: ExperimentTarget

-- | The resource type.
experimentTarget_resourceType :: Lens' ExperimentTarget (Maybe Text)

-- | The tags for the target resources.
experimentTarget_resourceTags :: Lens' ExperimentTarget (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific
--   attributes.
experimentTarget_filters :: Lens' ExperimentTarget (Maybe [ExperimentTargetFilter])

-- | The Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) of the resources.
experimentTarget_resourceArns :: Lens' ExperimentTarget (Maybe [Text])

-- | Scopes the identified resources to a specific count or percentage.
experimentTarget_selectionMode :: Lens' ExperimentTarget (Maybe Text)

-- | Describes an experiment template.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newExperimentTemplate</a> smart constructor.
data ExperimentTemplate
ExperimentTemplate' :: Maybe POSIX -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTemplateAction) -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateStopCondition] -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTemplateTarget) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe POSIX -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe Text -> ExperimentTemplate

-- | The time the experiment template was created.
[$sel:creationTime:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The actions for the experiment.
[$sel:actions:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTemplateAction)

-- | The stop conditions for the experiment.
[$sel:stopConditions:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateStopCondition]

-- | The targets for the experiment.
[$sel:targets:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTemplateTarget)

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
[$sel:id:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe Text

-- | The time the experiment template was last updated.
[$sel:lastUpdateTime:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe POSIX

-- | The description for the experiment template.
[$sel:description:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe Text

-- | The tags for the experiment template.
[$sel:tags:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role.
[$sel:roleArn:ExperimentTemplate'] :: ExperimentTemplate -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>ExperimentTemplate</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--

--   template was created.
--

--   <a>experimentTemplate_actions</a> - The actions for the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:stopConditions:ExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplate_stopConditions</a> - The stop conditions for the
--   experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:targets:ExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplate_targets</a> - The targets for the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:ExperimentTemplate'</a>, <a>experimentTemplate_id</a> - The
--   ID of the experiment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:lastUpdateTime:ExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplate_lastUpdateTime</a> - The time the experiment
--   template was last updated.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:ExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplate_description</a> - The description for the
--   experiment template.
--

--   The tags for the experiment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:ExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplate_roleArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of
--   an IAM role.
newExperimentTemplate :: ExperimentTemplate

-- | The time the experiment template was created.
experimentTemplate_creationTime :: Lens' ExperimentTemplate (Maybe UTCTime)

-- | The actions for the experiment.
experimentTemplate_actions :: Lens' ExperimentTemplate (Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTemplateAction))

experimentTemplate_stopConditions :: Lens' ExperimentTemplate (Maybe [ExperimentTemplateStopCondition])

experimentTemplate_targets :: Lens' ExperimentTemplate (Maybe (HashMap Text ExperimentTemplateTarget))

experimentTemplate_roleArn :: Lens' ExperimentTemplate (Maybe Text)

--   <a>$sel:values:ExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter'</a>,
--   <a>experimentTemplateTargetInputFilter_values</a> - The attribute
--   values for the filter.
newExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter :: Text -> ExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter

-- | The attribute path for the filter.
experimentTemplateTargetInputFilter_path :: Lens' ExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter Text

-- | The attribute values for the filter.
experimentTemplateTargetInputFilter_values :: Lens' ExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter [Text]

-- | Specifies an action for an experiment template.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem</a> smart
--   constructor.
data UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem
UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem' :: Maybe [Text] -> Maybe Text -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe Text -> UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem

-- | The name of the action that must be completed before the current
--   action starts. Omit this parameter to run the action at the start of
--   the experiment.
[$sel:startAfter:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The ID of the action.
[$sel:actionId:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem -> Maybe Text

-- | The parameters for the action, if applicable.
[$sel:parameters:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The targets for the action.
[$sel:targets:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | A description for the action.
[$sel:description:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem -> Maybe Text

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem</a> with
--   all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:startAfter:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem_startAfter</a> - The name
--   of the action that must be completed before the current action starts.
--   Omit this parameter to run the action at the start of the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actionId:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem_actionId</a> - The ID of
--   the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:parameters:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem_parameters</a> - The
--   parameters for the action, if applicable.
--   
--   <a>$sel:targets:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem_targets</a> - The targets
--   for the action.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem_description</a> - A
--   description for the action.
newUpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem :: UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem

-- | The name of the action that must be completed before the current
--   action starts. Omit this parameter to run the action at the start of
--   the experiment.
updateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem_startAfter :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem (Maybe [Text])

-- | A description for the action.
updateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem_description :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem (Maybe Text)

-- | Specifies a stop condition for an experiment. You can define a stop
--   condition as a CloudWatch alarm.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput</a> smart
--   constructor.
data UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput
UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput' :: Maybe Text -> Text -> UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch alarm.
[$sel:value:UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput -> Maybe Text

-- | The source for the stop condition. Specify
--   <tt>aws:cloudwatch:alarm</tt> if the stop condition is defined by a
--   CloudWatch alarm. Specify <tt>none</tt> if there is no stop condition.
[$sel:source:UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput</a>
--   with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--

--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput_value</a> - The Amazon
--   Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch alarm.
--   
--   <a>$sel:source:UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput_source</a> - The source
--   for the stop condition. Specify <tt>aws:cloudwatch:alarm</tt> if the
--   stop condition is defined by a CloudWatch alarm. Specify <tt>none</tt>
--   if there is no stop condition.
newUpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput :: Text -> UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the CloudWatch alarm.
updateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput_value :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput (Maybe Text)

-- | The source for the stop condition. Specify
--   <tt>aws:cloudwatch:alarm</tt> if the stop condition is defined by a
--   CloudWatch alarm. Specify <tt>none</tt> if there is no stop condition.
updateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput_source :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput Text

-- | Specifies a target for an experiment. You must specify at least one
--   Amazon Resource Name (ARN) or at least one resource tag. You cannot
--   specify both.
--   
--   <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput</a> smart
--   constructor.
data UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput
UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput' :: Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter] -> Maybe [Text] -> Text -> Text -> UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput

-- | The tags for the target resources.
[$sel:resourceTags:UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | The filters to apply to identify target resources using specific
--   attributes.
[$sel:filters:UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateTargetInputFilter]

[$sel:resourceArns:UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The AWS resource type. The resource type must be supported for the
--   specified action.
[$sel:resourceType:UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Text

-- | Scopes the identified resources to a specific count or percentage.
[$sel:selectionMode:UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.

--   Resource Names (ARNs) of the targets.

--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateTargetInput_resourceType</a> - The AWS
--   resource type. The resource type must be supported for the specified
--   action.
--

--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateTargetInput_selectionMode</a> - Scopes the
--   identified resources to a specific count or percentage.

--   attributes.

-- | Applies the specified tags to the specified resource.
module Network.AWS.FIS.TagResource

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newTagResource</a> smart constructor.
data TagResource
TagResource' :: Text -> HashMap Text Text -> TagResource

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
[$sel:resourceArn:TagResource'] :: TagResource -> Text

-- | The tags for the resource.
[$sel:tags:TagResource'] :: TagResource -> HashMap Text Text

-- | Create a value of <a>TagResource</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceArn:TagResource'</a>, <a>tagResource_resourceArn</a> -
--   The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:TagResource'</a>, <a>tagResource_tags</a> - The tags for
--   the resource.
newTagResource :: Text -> TagResource

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
tagResource_resourceArn :: Lens' TagResource Text

-- | The tags for the resource.
tagResource_tags :: Lens' TagResource (HashMap Text Text)

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newTagResourceResponse</a> smart constructor.
data TagResourceResponse

--   omitted.

--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:

--   <a>tagResourceResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's http status
--   code.
newTagResourceResponse :: Int -> TagResourceResponse

-- | The response's http status code.
tagResourceResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' TagResourceResponse Int

-- | Starts running an experiment from the specified experiment template.
module Network.AWS.FIS.StartExperiment

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newStartExperiment</a> smart constructor.
data StartExperiment
StartExperiment' :: Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Text -> Text -> StartExperiment

-- | The tags to apply to the experiment.
[$sel:tags:StartExperiment'] :: StartExperiment -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the
--   idempotency of the request.
[$sel:clientToken:StartExperiment'] :: StartExperiment -> Text

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
[$sel:experimentTemplateId:StartExperiment'] :: StartExperiment -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>StartExperiment</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:StartExperiment'</a>, <a>startExperiment_tags</a> - The
--   tags to apply to the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:clientToken:StartExperiment'</a>,
--   <a>startExperiment_clientToken</a> - Unique, case-sensitive identifier
--   that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request.
--   
--   <a>$sel:experimentTemplateId:StartExperiment'</a>,
--   <a>startExperiment_experimentTemplateId</a> - The ID of the experiment
--   template.
newStartExperiment :: Text -> Text -> StartExperiment

-- | The tags to apply to the experiment.
startExperiment_tags :: Lens' StartExperiment (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the
--   idempotency of the request.
startExperiment_clientToken :: Lens' StartExperiment Text

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
startExperiment_experimentTemplateId :: Lens' StartExperiment Text

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newStartExperimentResponse</a> smart constructor.
data StartExperimentResponse

[$sel:experiment:StartExperimentResponse'] :: StartExperimentResponse -> Maybe Experiment

[$sel:httpStatus:StartExperimentResponse'] :: StartExperimentResponse -> Int

--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   experiment.

--   code.

-- | Lists your experiments.
module Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newListExperiments</a> smart constructor.
data ListExperiments
ListExperiments' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Natural -> ListExperiments

-- | The token for the next page of results.
[$sel:nextToken:ListExperiments'] :: ListExperiments -> Maybe Text

-- | The maximum number of results to return with a single call. To
--   retrieve the remaining results, make another call with the returned
--   <tt>nextToken</tt> value.
[$sel:maxResults:ListExperiments'] :: ListExperiments -> Maybe Natural

-- | Create a value of <a>ListExperiments</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:nextToken:ListExperiments'</a>,
--   <a>listExperiments_nextToken</a> - The token for the next page of
--   results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:maxResults:ListExperiments'</a>,
--   <a>listExperiments_maxResults</a> - The maximum number of results to
--   return with a single call. To retrieve the remaining results, make
--   another call with the returned <tt>nextToken</tt> value.
newListExperiments :: ListExperiments

-- | The token for the next page of results.
listExperiments_nextToken :: Lens' ListExperiments (Maybe Text)

-- | The maximum number of results to return with a single call. To
--   retrieve the remaining results, make another call with the returned
--   <tt>nextToken</tt> value.
listExperiments_maxResults :: Lens' ListExperiments (Maybe Natural)

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newListExperimentsResponse</a> smart constructor.
data ListExperimentsResponse
ListExperimentsResponse' :: Maybe [ExperimentSummary] -> Maybe Text -> Int -> ListExperimentsResponse

-- | The experiments.
[$sel:experiments:ListExperimentsResponse'] :: ListExperimentsResponse -> Maybe [ExperimentSummary]

-- | The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is
--   <tt>null</tt> when there are no more results to return.
[$sel:nextToken:ListExperimentsResponse'] :: ListExperimentsResponse -> Maybe Text

-- | The response's http status code.
[$sel:httpStatus:ListExperimentsResponse'] :: ListExperimentsResponse -> Int

-- | Create a value of <a>ListExperimentsResponse</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:experiments:ListExperimentsResponse'</a>,
--   <a>listExperimentsResponse_experiments</a> - The experiments.
--   
--   <a>$sel:nextToken:ListExperiments'</a>,
--   <a>listExperimentsResponse_nextToken</a> - The token to use to
--   retrieve the next page of results. This value is <tt>null</tt> when
--   there are no more results to return.
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:ListExperimentsResponse'</a>,
--   <a>listExperimentsResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's http status
--   code.
newListExperimentsResponse :: Int -> ListExperimentsResponse

-- | The experiments.
listExperimentsResponse_experiments :: Lens' ListExperimentsResponse (Maybe [ExperimentSummary])

-- | The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is
--   <tt>null</tt> when there are no more results to return.
listExperimentsResponse_nextToken :: Lens' ListExperimentsResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The response's http status code.
listExperimentsResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' ListExperimentsResponse Int
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments.ListExperiments
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments.ListExperiments
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments.ListExperiments
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments.ListExperiments
instance GHC.Generics.Generic Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments.ListExperimentsResponse
instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments.ListExperimentsResponse
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments.ListExperimentsResponse
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments.ListExperimentsResponse
instance Network.AWS.Types.AWSRequest Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments.ListExperiments
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments.ListExperimentsResponse
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments.ListExperiments
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments.ListExperiments
instance Network.AWS.Data.Headers.ToHeaders Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments.ListExperiments
instance Network.AWS.Data.Path.ToPath Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments.ListExperiments
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperiments.ListExperiments


-- | Lists your experiment templates.
module Network.AWS.FIS.ListExperimentTemplates

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newListExperimentTemplates</a> smart constructor.
data ListExperimentTemplates
ListExperimentTemplates' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Natural -> ListExperimentTemplates

-- | The token for the next page of results.
[$sel:nextToken:ListExperimentTemplates'] :: ListExperimentTemplates -> Maybe Text

-- | The maximum number of results to return with a single call. To
--   retrieve the remaining results, make another call with the returned
--   <tt>nextToken</tt> value.
[$sel:maxResults:ListExperimentTemplates'] :: ListExperimentTemplates -> Maybe Natural

-- | Create a value of <a>ListExperimentTemplates</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:nextToken:ListExperimentTemplates'</a>,
--   <a>listExperimentTemplates_nextToken</a> - The token for the next page
--   of results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:maxResults:ListExperimentTemplates'</a>,
--   <a>listExperimentTemplates_maxResults</a> - The maximum number of
--   results to return with a single call. To retrieve the remaining
--   results, make another call with the returned <tt>nextToken</tt> value.
newListExperimentTemplates :: ListExperimentTemplates

-- | The token for the next page of results.
listExperimentTemplates_nextToken :: Lens' ListExperimentTemplates (Maybe Text)

-- | The maximum number of results to return with a single call. To
--   retrieve the remaining results, make another call with the returned
--   <tt>nextToken</tt> value.
listExperimentTemplates_maxResults :: Lens' ListExperimentTemplates (Maybe Natural)

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newListExperimentTemplatesResponse</a> smart
--   constructor.
data ListExperimentTemplatesResponse
ListExperimentTemplatesResponse' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateSummary] -> Int -> ListExperimentTemplatesResponse

-- | The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is
--   <tt>null</tt> when there are no more results to return.
[$sel:nextToken:ListExperimentTemplatesResponse'] :: ListExperimentTemplatesResponse -> Maybe Text

-- | The experiment templates.
[$sel:experimentTemplates:ListExperimentTemplatesResponse'] :: ListExperimentTemplatesResponse -> Maybe [ExperimentTemplateSummary]

-- | The response's http status code.
[$sel:httpStatus:ListExperimentTemplatesResponse'] :: ListExperimentTemplatesResponse -> Int

-- | Create a value of <a>ListExperimentTemplatesResponse</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:nextToken:ListExperimentTemplates'</a>,
--   <a>listExperimentTemplatesResponse_nextToken</a> - The token to use to
--   retrieve the next page of results. This value is <tt>null</tt> when
--   there are no more results to return.
--   
--   <a>$sel:experimentTemplates:ListExperimentTemplatesResponse'</a>,
--   <a>listExperimentTemplatesResponse_experimentTemplates</a> - The
--   experiment templates.
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:ListExperimentTemplatesResponse'</a>,
--   <a>listExperimentTemplatesResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's
--   http status code.
newListExperimentTemplatesResponse :: Int -> ListExperimentTemplatesResponse

-- | The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is
--   <tt>null</tt> when there are no more results to return.
listExperimentTemplatesResponse_nextToken :: Lens' ListExperimentTemplatesResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The experiment templates.
listExperimentTemplatesResponse_experimentTemplates :: Lens' ListExperimentTemplatesResponse (Maybe [ExperimentTemplateSummary])

listExperimentTemplatesResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' ListExperimentTemplatesResponse Int

-- | Lists the available AWS FIS actions.
module Network.AWS.FIS.ListActions

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newListActions</a> smart constructor.
data ListActions
ListActions' :: Maybe Text -> Maybe Natural -> ListActions

-- | The token for the next page of results.
[$sel:nextToken:ListActions'] :: ListActions -> Maybe Text

-- | The maximum number of results to return with a single call. To
--   retrieve the remaining results, make another call with the returned
--   <tt>nextToken</tt> value.
[$sel:maxResults:ListActions'] :: ListActions -> Maybe Natural

-- | Create a value of <a>ListActions</a> with all optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:nextToken:ListActions'</a>, <a>listActions_nextToken</a> - The
--   token for the next page of results.
--   
--   <a>$sel:maxResults:ListActions'</a>, <a>listActions_maxResults</a> -
--   The maximum number of results to return with a single call. To
--   retrieve the remaining results, make another call with the returned
--   <tt>nextToken</tt> value.
newListActions :: ListActions

-- | The token for the next page of results.
listActions_nextToken :: Lens' ListActions (Maybe Text)

-- | The maximum number of results to return with a single call. To
--   retrieve the remaining results, make another call with the returned
--   <tt>nextToken</tt> value.
listActions_maxResults :: Lens' ListActions (Maybe Natural)

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newListActionsResponse</a> smart constructor.
data ListActionsResponse
ListActionsResponse' :: Maybe [ActionSummary] -> Maybe Text -> Int -> ListActionsResponse

-- | The actions.
[$sel:actions:ListActionsResponse'] :: ListActionsResponse -> Maybe [ActionSummary]

-- | The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is
--   <tt>null</tt> when there are no more results to return.
[$sel:nextToken:ListActionsResponse'] :: ListActionsResponse -> Maybe Text

-- | The response's http status code.
[$sel:httpStatus:ListActionsResponse'] :: ListActionsResponse -> Int

-- | Create a value of <a>ListActionsResponse</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:actions:ListActionsResponse'</a>,
--   <a>listActionsResponse_actions</a> - The actions.
--   
--   <a>$sel:nextToken:ListActions'</a>,
--   <a>listActionsResponse_nextToken</a> - The token to use to retrieve
--   the next page of results. This value is <tt>null</tt> when there are
--   no more results to return.
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:ListActionsResponse'</a>,
--   <a>listActionsResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's http status
--   code.
newListActionsResponse :: Int -> ListActionsResponse

-- | The actions.
listActionsResponse_actions :: Lens' ListActionsResponse (Maybe [ActionSummary])

-- | The token to use to retrieve the next page of results. This value is
--   <tt>null</tt> when there are no more results to return.
listActionsResponse_nextToken :: Lens' ListActionsResponse (Maybe Text)

-- | The response's http status code.
listActionsResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' ListActionsResponse Int

instance GHC.Show.Show Network.AWS.FIS.ListActions.ListActions
instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.ListActions.ListActions
instance GHC.Classes.Eq Network.AWS.FIS.ListActions.ListActions

instance Network.AWS.Data.Headers.ToHeaders Network.AWS.FIS.ListActions.ListActions
instance Network.AWS.Data.Path.ToPath Network.AWS.FIS.ListActions.ListActions

-- | Gets information about the specified experiment template.

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newGetExperimentTemplate</a> smart constructor.
data GetExperimentTemplate
GetExperimentTemplate' :: Text -> GetExperimentTemplate

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
[$sel:id:GetExperimentTemplate'] :: GetExperimentTemplate -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>GetExperimentTemplate</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional

-- | Gets information about the specified experiment.

-- | The ID of the action.

--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--

-- | Deletes the specified experiment template.
module Network.AWS.FIS.DeleteExperimentTemplate

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newDeleteExperimentTemplate</a> smart constructor.
data DeleteExperimentTemplate
DeleteExperimentTemplate' :: Text -> DeleteExperimentTemplate

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
[$sel:id:DeleteExperimentTemplate'] :: DeleteExperimentTemplate -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>DeleteExperimentTemplate</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:DeleteExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>deleteExperimentTemplate_id</a> - The ID of the experiment
--   template.
newDeleteExperimentTemplate :: Text -> DeleteExperimentTemplate

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
deleteExperimentTemplate_id :: Lens' DeleteExperimentTemplate Text

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newDeleteExperimentTemplateResponse</a> smart
--   constructor.
data DeleteExperimentTemplateResponse
DeleteExperimentTemplateResponse' :: Maybe ExperimentTemplate -> Int -> DeleteExperimentTemplateResponse

-- | Information about the experiment template.
[$sel:experimentTemplate:DeleteExperimentTemplateResponse'] :: DeleteExperimentTemplateResponse -> Maybe ExperimentTemplate

-- | The response's http status code.
[$sel:httpStatus:DeleteExperimentTemplateResponse'] :: DeleteExperimentTemplateResponse -> Int

-- | Create a value of <a>DeleteExperimentTemplateResponse</a> with all
--   optional fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:experimentTemplate:DeleteExperimentTemplateResponse'</a>,
--   <a>deleteExperimentTemplateResponse_experimentTemplate</a> -
--   Information about the experiment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:DeleteExperimentTemplateResponse'</a>,
--   <a>deleteExperimentTemplateResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's
--   http status code.
newDeleteExperimentTemplateResponse :: Int -> DeleteExperimentTemplateResponse

-- | Information about the experiment template.
deleteExperimentTemplateResponse_experimentTemplate :: Lens' DeleteExperimentTemplateResponse (Maybe ExperimentTemplate)

-- | The response's http status code.
deleteExperimentTemplateResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' DeleteExperimentTemplateResponse Int

instance GHC.Read.Read Network.AWS.FIS.DeleteExperimentTemplate.DeleteExperimentTemplate

instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FIS.DeleteExperimentTemplate.DeleteExperimentTemplateResponse
instance Data.Hashable.Class.Hashable Network.AWS.FIS.DeleteExperimentTemplate.DeleteExperimentTemplate
instance Control.DeepSeq.NFData Network.AWS.FIS.DeleteExperimentTemplate.DeleteExperimentTemplate
instance Network.AWS.Data.Headers.ToHeaders Network.AWS.FIS.DeleteExperimentTemplate.DeleteExperimentTemplate
instance Network.AWS.Data.Path.ToPath Network.AWS.FIS.DeleteExperimentTemplate.DeleteExperimentTemplate
instance Network.AWS.Data.Query.ToQuery Network.AWS.FIS.DeleteExperimentTemplate.DeleteExperimentTemplate


-- | Creates an experiment template.
--   
--   To create a template, specify the following information:
--   
--   <ul>
--   <li><b>Targets</b>: A target can be a specific resource in your AWS
--   environment, or one or more resources that match criteria that you
--   specify, for example, resources that have specific tags.</li>
--   <li><b>Actions</b>: The actions to carry out on the target. You can
--   specify multiple actions, the duration of each action, and when to
--   start each action during an experiment.</li>
--   <li><b>Stop conditions</b>: If a stop condition is triggered while an
--   experiment is running, the experiment is automatically stopped. You
--   can define a stop condition as a CloudWatch alarm.</li>
--   </ul>
--   
--   For more information, see the <a>AWS Fault Injection Simulator User
--   Guide</a>.
module Network.AWS.FIS.CreateExperimentTemplate

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateExperimentTemplate</a> smart constructor.
data CreateExperimentTemplate
CreateExperimentTemplate' :: Maybe (HashMap Text CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput) -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text) -> Text -> Text -> [CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput] -> HashMap Text CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput -> Text -> CreateExperimentTemplate

-- | The targets for the experiment.
[$sel:targets:CreateExperimentTemplate'] :: CreateExperimentTemplate -> Maybe (HashMap Text CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput)

-- | The tags to apply to the experiment template.
[$sel:tags:CreateExperimentTemplate'] :: CreateExperimentTemplate -> Maybe (HashMap Text Text)

-- | Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the
--   idempotency of the request.
[$sel:clientToken:CreateExperimentTemplate'] :: CreateExperimentTemplate -> Text

-- | A description for the experiment template. Can contain up to 64
--   letters (A-Z and a-z).
[$sel:description:CreateExperimentTemplate'] :: CreateExperimentTemplate -> Text

-- | The stop conditions.
[$sel:stopConditions:CreateExperimentTemplate'] :: CreateExperimentTemplate -> [CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput]

-- | The actions for the experiment.
[$sel:actions:CreateExperimentTemplate'] :: CreateExperimentTemplate -> HashMap Text CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS FIS
--   service permission to perform service actions on your behalf.
[$sel:roleArn:CreateExperimentTemplate'] :: CreateExperimentTemplate -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>CreateExperimentTemplate</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:targets:CreateExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplate_targets</a> - The targets for the
--   experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:tags:CreateExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplate_tags</a> - The tags to apply to the
--   experiment template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:clientToken:CreateExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplate_clientToken</a> - Unique, case-sensitive
--   identifier that you provide to ensure the idempotency of the request.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:CreateExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplate_description</a> - A description for the
--   experiment template. Can contain up to 64 letters (A-Z and a-z).
--   
--   <a>$sel:stopConditions:CreateExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplate_stopConditions</a> - The stop conditions.
--   
--   <a>$sel:actions:CreateExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplate_actions</a> - The actions for the
--   experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:CreateExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>createExperimentTemplate_roleArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS FIS service permission to
--   perform service actions on your behalf.
newCreateExperimentTemplate :: Text -> Text -> Text -> CreateExperimentTemplate

-- | The targets for the experiment.
createExperimentTemplate_targets :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplate (Maybe (HashMap Text CreateExperimentTemplateTargetInput))

-- | The tags to apply to the experiment template.
createExperimentTemplate_tags :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplate (Maybe (HashMap Text Text))

-- | Unique, case-sensitive identifier that you provide to ensure the
--   idempotency of the request.
createExperimentTemplate_clientToken :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplate Text

-- | A description for the experiment template. Can contain up to 64
--   letters (A-Z and a-z).
createExperimentTemplate_description :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplate Text

-- | The stop conditions.
createExperimentTemplate_stopConditions :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplate [CreateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput]

-- | The actions for the experiment.
createExperimentTemplate_actions :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplate (HashMap Text CreateExperimentTemplateActionInput)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS FIS
--   service permission to perform service actions on your behalf.
createExperimentTemplate_roleArn :: Lens' CreateExperimentTemplate Text

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newCreateExperimentTemplateResponse</a> smart
--   constructor.

-- | Removes the specified tags from the specified resource.
module Network.AWS.FIS.UntagResource

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newUntagResource</a> smart constructor.
data UntagResource
UntagResource' :: Maybe [Text] -> Text -> UntagResource

-- | The tag keys to remove.
[$sel:tagKeys:UntagResource'] :: UntagResource -> Maybe [Text]

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
[$sel:resourceArn:UntagResource'] :: UntagResource -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>UntagResource</a> with all optional fields
--   omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:tagKeys:UntagResource'</a>, <a>untagResource_tagKeys</a> - The
--   tag keys to remove.
--   
--   <a>$sel:resourceArn:UntagResource'</a>,
--   <a>untagResource_resourceArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of
--   the resource.
newUntagResource :: Text -> UntagResource

-- | The tag keys to remove.
untagResource_tagKeys :: Lens' UntagResource (Maybe [Text])

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource.
untagResource_resourceArn :: Lens' UntagResource Text

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newUntagResourceResponse</a> smart constructor.
data UntagResourceResponse
UntagResourceResponse' :: Int -> UntagResourceResponse

[$sel:httpStatus:UntagResourceResponse'] :: UntagResourceResponse -> Int

-- | Create a value of <a>UntagResourceResponse</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.

--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:httpStatus:UntagResourceResponse'</a>,
--   <a>untagResourceResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's http status
--   code.
newUntagResourceResponse :: Int -> UntagResourceResponse

-- | The response's http status code.
untagResourceResponse_httpStatus :: Lens' UntagResourceResponse Int

-- | Updates the specified experiment template.
module Network.AWS.FIS.UpdateExperimentTemplate

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateExperimentTemplate</a> smart constructor.
data UpdateExperimentTemplate
UpdateExperimentTemplate' :: Maybe (HashMap Text UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem) -> Maybe [UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput] -> Maybe (HashMap Text UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput) -> Maybe Text -> Maybe Text -> Text -> UpdateExperimentTemplate

-- | The actions for the experiment.
[$sel:actions:UpdateExperimentTemplate'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplate -> Maybe (HashMap Text UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem)

-- | The stop conditions for the experiment.
[$sel:stopConditions:UpdateExperimentTemplate'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplate -> Maybe [UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput]

-- | The targets for the experiment.
[$sel:targets:UpdateExperimentTemplate'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplate -> Maybe (HashMap Text UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput)

-- | A description for the template.
[$sel:description:UpdateExperimentTemplate'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplate -> Maybe Text

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS FIS
--   service permission to perform service actions on your behalf.
[$sel:roleArn:UpdateExperimentTemplate'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplate -> Maybe Text

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
[$sel:id:UpdateExperimentTemplate'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplate -> Text

-- | Create a value of <a>UpdateExperimentTemplate</a> with all optional
--   fields omitted.
--   
--   Use <a>generic-lens</a> or <a>optics</a> to modify other optional
--   fields.
--   
--   The following record fields are available, with the corresponding
--   lenses provided for backwards compatibility:
--   
--   <a>$sel:actions:UpdateExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplate_actions</a> - The actions for the
--   experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:stopConditions:UpdateExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplate_stopConditions</a> - The stop conditions
--   for the experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:targets:UpdateExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplate_targets</a> - The targets for the
--   experiment.
--   
--   <a>$sel:description:UpdateExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplate_description</a> - A description for the
--   template.
--   
--   <a>$sel:roleArn:UpdateExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplate_roleArn</a> - The Amazon Resource Name
--   (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS FIS service permission to
--   perform service actions on your behalf.
--   
--   <a>$sel:id:UpdateExperimentTemplate'</a>,
--   <a>updateExperimentTemplate_id</a> - The ID of the experiment
--   template.
newUpdateExperimentTemplate :: Text -> UpdateExperimentTemplate

-- | The actions for the experiment.
updateExperimentTemplate_actions :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplate (Maybe (HashMap Text UpdateExperimentTemplateActionInputItem))

-- | The stop conditions for the experiment.
updateExperimentTemplate_stopConditions :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplate (Maybe [UpdateExperimentTemplateStopConditionInput])

-- | The targets for the experiment.
updateExperimentTemplate_targets :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplate (Maybe (HashMap Text UpdateExperimentTemplateTargetInput))

-- | A description for the template.
updateExperimentTemplate_description :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplate (Maybe Text)

-- | The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of an IAM role that grants the AWS FIS
--   service permission to perform service actions on your behalf.
updateExperimentTemplate_roleArn :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplate (Maybe Text)

-- | The ID of the experiment template.
updateExperimentTemplate_id :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplate Text

-- | <i>See:</i> <a>newUpdateExperimentTemplateResponse</a> smart
--   constructor.
data UpdateExperimentTemplateResponse
UpdateExperimentTemplateResponse' :: Maybe ExperimentTemplate -> Int -> UpdateExperimentTemplateResponse

-- | Information about the experiment template.
[$sel:experimentTemplate:UpdateExperimentTemplateResponse'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateResponse -> Maybe ExperimentTemplate

-- | The response's http status code.
[$sel:httpStatus:UpdateExperimentTemplateResponse'] :: UpdateExperimentTemplateResponse -> Int

--   optional fields omitted.

--   <a>updateExperimentTemplateResponse_httpStatus</a> - The response's
--   http status code.
newUpdateExperimentTemplateResponse :: Int -> UpdateExperimentTemplateResponse

updateExperimentTemplateResponse_experimentTemplate :: Lens' UpdateExperimentTemplateResponse (Maybe ExperimentTemplate)
